description: This file implements back-end APIs for DNS configuration management in the COSA Data Model, including creation, initialization, registration, removal, and registration information handling for DNS servers and relay forwarding configurations.

classes.name: COSA_DATAMODEL_DNS
classes.description: Data structure representing DNS configuration in the COSA Data Model, including servers and relay forwarding lists and related operations.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE CosaDNSCreate(VOID)
methods.description: Constructs and returns a new instance of the DNS data model object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDNSInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes DNS configuration, loads current settings from persistent storage, and populates internal data structures.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDNSRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Removes and frees resources associated with the DNS data model object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDNSRegGetInfo(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Retrieves DNS server and relay forwarding information from persistent storage into internal data structures.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDNSRegAddInfo(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * pNextInsNumName,ULONG ulNextInsNum,char * pPreffix,ULONG ulUpperInsNum,char * pAlias,ANSC_HANDLE hCosaContext)
methods.description: Adds DNS server or relay forwarding entries into persistent storage, updating related references and IDs.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDNSRegDelInfo(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCosaContext)
methods.description: Deletes DNS server or relay forwarding entries from persistent storage.

ctags.name: CosaDNSRegAddInfo
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * pNextInsNumName,ULONG ulNextInsNum,char * pPreffix,ULONG ulUpperInsNum,char * pAlias,ANSC_HANDLE hCosaContext)
